A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It was entertaining\, but it wasn't Star Wars. Missed a huge opportunity to enhance the franchise. Reye did not train to become a Jedi like Luke did. Took a number of opportunities to shove the popular opinions of the day into a scene where it had no place. The intimate conversations and wisdom between shared in older movies was non existent. Luke was nothing but a shadow of himself where he should have been positioned as the next Yoda. Luke's mistake was that becoming a Jedi required seeking\, not forced training like he did in the past. Could have capitalized on the concept. The only memorable qoute was from Yoda - you are what you grow beyond.
